pkgmetadata.longdescription: Out-of-Treatment Testing // Implements the out-of-treatment testing from Kuelpmann and Kuzmics (2020) doi:10.2139/ssrn.3441675 based on the Vuong Test introduced in Vuong (1989) doi:10.2307/1912557. Out-of treatment testing allows for a direct, pairwise likelihood comparison of theories, calibrated with pre-existing data.
